name: The Nomads of Dragon Storms
storyline:
The land is beautiful but it is doomed. The air is fresh but dangerous. The whole world is succumbed with ancent dragon bones... Could they be the reason for this world's wounds?

You don't care. Because you have to move on! The storms are coming! The lands you know will be overwhelmed with Dragon Storms in a few days so you must move with your flock to warmer lands. Unfortunately, you're just an archivist in the Nomad culture. You live for ancient knowledge and history so you don't know how to care your animals really. Since there was an avalanche that cut your way with your people, you have to learn along the way. You are alone now... With 50 of your flock!

The Nomads of Dragon Storms is an open world third person management & survival game that you have to take care of your flock while constantly moving and avoiding the cold magical storms of the ancient land.
summary: Survive, explore and travel with your flock in a vast, beautiful fantasy world. The Nomads is a fantasy medieval management & survival adventure.
